children.text: There are visible scratches/dents in the sink that need to be removed.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 18.02 Faults and damage to appliances and fittings states that
‘Damage to appliances and fittings supplied as part of the building contract is defective if it is due to the builder’s workmanship’ .
This basin will need to be replaced or repaired in accordance with above.
